    Serialized Form

    • Package <Unnamed>

      • Class EditorGUI

        class EditorGUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • changesLabel
            JLabel changesLabel
            A label to display changes made in the editor. This label is updated whenever the text in the editor changes.
          • editor
            Editor editor
            The main editor instance that holds the text and provides editing functionalities. It can be an instance of TranslateEditor or SpellCheckEditor.
          • inputField
            JTextField inputField
            A text field for user input. This field allows users to enter text that will be added to the editor.
          • textArea
            JTextArea textArea
            A text area to display the content of the editor. This area is non-editable and shows the current text in the editor.
          • translateMode
            boolean translateMode
            A flag to determine whether the translation mode is enabled. If true, the editor will translate text to Lithuanian; otherwise, it will not.

    • Package editor

      • Class editor.Editor

        class Editor extends Object implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • text
            String text
            The text content of the editor.

      • Class editor.SpellCheckEditor

        class SpellCheckEditor extends Editor implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • dictionary
            List<String> dictionary
            The dictionary of words used for spell-checking.

      • Class editor.TranslateEditor

        class TranslateEditor extends Editor implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • englishWords
            LinkedList<String> englishWords
            Lists to store English and Lithuanian words.
          • lithuanianWords
            LinkedList<String> lithuanianWords
            Lists to store Lithuanian words corresponding to the English words.
